oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clark St. MB Church: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clark St. at 5th Ave., Huntingdon, TN 38344
Fieldnotes of Clark Street Missionary Baptist Church. Notes document the location of the church and provide chronological information about its construction.

Clark Street Missionary Baptist Church is a congregation located in Huntingdon, Tennessee. The current building dates back to 1920; however, in 1981, the building was remodeled under the pastorate of Reverend Lonnie Grimes and with the aid of Golden Eagle Lodge #110, a local Masonic chapter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
